title: U2 The Best of 1980 -1990 FLAC
description:
The Best of 1980Ã¢â‚¬â€œ1990 is the first greatest hits compilation by Irish rock band U2, released in November 1998. It mostly contains the group's hit singles from the eighties but also mixes in some live staples as well as one new recording, Sweetest Thing. In April 1999, a companion video (featuring music videos and live footage) was released. The album was followed by another compilation, The Best of 1990Ã¢â‚¬â€œ2000, in 2002.
